trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> para um item de dados no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>coleta deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados que está associado com o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewDataItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the for item.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do para item .

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho de <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref> elements, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"></xref> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> elementos, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TreeView"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer"> </xref> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "TreeView".
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "TreeView".

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A instância atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de automação de interface do usuário permite mais de um elemento filho a ser selecionado simultaneamente.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a seleção múltipla é permitida. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um provedor de automação de interface do usuário para cada elemento filho que está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: A collection of UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de provedores de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o provedor de automação de interface do usuário requer pelo menos um elemento filho a ser selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TreeViewAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if selection is required; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a seleção é obrigatória. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
